alert.note: Alert for Adams; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 7:28PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF LEWIS, SOUTHEASTERN ADAMS AND WESTERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM EST... At 727 PM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located near Vanceburg, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, New Boston, Vanceburg, Head of Grassy, Rosemount, Clarktown, Camp Dix, Rome, Lucasville, Sciotodale, Blue Creek, Saint Paul, Minford, Kinniconick, Sciotoville, Friendship, Mcdermott, Stricklett, Rexton and Lombardsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
